messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Plants can go eat a dick

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.body: I, Jonah Rohtin, am now your acting captain.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.body: Engineersss sssec got hit think you guysss can sssolve it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.body: All must contribute to the conservation of desk lamps!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Virology.

messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.
